00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.CreateSequenceStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Sequence;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.Arrays;
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class CreateSequenceChange extends AbstractChange {
00020 
00021     private String schemaName;
00022     private String sequenceName;
00023     private Integer startValue;
00024     private Integer incrementBy;
00025     private Integer maxValue;
00026     private Integer minValue;
00027     private Boolean ordered;
00028 
00029 
00030     public CreateSequenceChange() {
00031         super("createSequence", "Create Sequence");
00032     }
00033 
00034     public String getSchemaName() {
00035         return schemaName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00039         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public String getSequenceName() {
00043         return sequenceName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public void setSequenceName(String sequenceName) {
00047         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public Integer getStartValue() {
00051         return startValue;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public void setStartValue(Integer startValue) {
00055         this.startValue = startValue;
00056     }
00057 
00058     public Integer getIncrementBy() {
00059         return incrementBy;
00060     }
00061 
00062     public void setIncrementBy(Integer incrementBy) {
00063         this.incrementBy = incrementBy;
00064     }
00065 
00066     public Integer getMaxValue() {
00067         return maxValue;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public void setMaxValue(Integer maxValue) {
00071         this.maxValue = maxValue;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public Integer getMinValue() {
00075         return minValue;
00076     }
00077 
00078     public void setMinValue(Integer minValue) {
00079         this.minValue = minValue;
00080     }
00081 
00082     public Boolean isOrdered() {
00083         return ordered;
00084     }
00085 
00086     public void setOrdered(Boolean ordered) {
00087         this.ordered = ordered;
00088     }
00089 
00090     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00091         return new SqlStatement[] {
00092                 new CreateSequenceStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getSequenceName())
00093                 .setIncrementBy(getIncrementBy())
00094                 .setMaxValue(getMaxValue())
00095                 .setMinValue(getMinValue())
00096                 .setOrdered(isOrdered())
00097                 .setStartValue(getStartValue())
00098         };
00099     }
00100 
00101     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00102         DropSequenceChange inverse = new DropSequenceChange();
00103         inverse.setSequenceName(getSequenceName());
00104 
00105         return new Change[]{
00106                 inverse
00107         };
00108     }
00109 
00110     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00111         return "Sequence " + getSequenceName() + " created";
00112     }
00113 
00114     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00115         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("createSequence");
00116         node.setAttribute("sequenceName", getSequenceName());
00117         if (getMinValue() != null) {
00118             node.setAttribute("minValue", getMinValue().toString());
00119         }
00120         if (getMaxValue() != null) {
00121             node.setAttribute("maxValue", getMaxValue().toString());
00122         }
00123         if (getIncrementBy() != null) {
00124             node.setAttribute("incrementBy", getIncrementBy().toString());
00125         }
00126         if (isOrdered() != null) {
00127             node.setAttribute("ordered", isOrdered().toString());
00128         }
00129 
00130         if (getStartValue() != null) {
00131             node.setAttribute("startValue", getStartValue().toString());
00132         }
00133 
00134         return node;
00135     }
00136 
00137 
00138     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00139         Sequence dbObject = new Sequence();
00140         dbObject.setName(sequenceName);
00141 
00142         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00143     }
00144 }
